name: getFreeBets
description: Retrieves the current free bets available for a customer.

apiKey.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

apiSecret.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

apiTicket.description: The ticket obtained from the sessions API

fields.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma Separated List)

include.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma Separated List)

exclude.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma Separated List)

$ul: **awardDateTime**: The time the free bet was awarded. For example 2014-11-013T23:59:10
**displayText**: The message explaining the offer displayed to the customer along with the free bet
**expiryDateTime**: The time the free bet expired. For example 2014-11-013T23:59:10
**id**: The identifier of the free bet
**offerDesc**: The description of the offer that enabled the customer to place a free bet
**offerName**: The name of the offer that enabled the customer to place a free bet
**startDateTime**: The time the free bet offer started. For example 2014-11-013T23:59:10
**value**: The value of the free bet
